thread.title: Kim Kardashian Praises Kanye West for Turning Her into a Fashion Icon - Video

author: newsr.in
title: Kim Kardashian Praises Kanye West for Turning Her into a Fashion Icon - Video
text: Kanye West ’s second collection for Adidas, which debuted at the New York Fashion Week 2015, was met widely with ridicule, but he still thinks he’s a fashion genius. Unsurprisingly, his wife Kim Kardashian West is of the same opinion: he is a fashion genius because he is the one who turned her into a fashion icon. The latest video from CNN Style (see below) focuses on Kim’s rise from derided reality star to the status of celebrity all designers want to put in the first row ... »
